Circulars for website(Cicular) 
NO.CAS-8(1)/2004-Div.I 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
‘A’ WING , JANPATH BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
 
Date: 24-11-2008 
 
 
CIRCULAR No. 14/2008 
 
SUBJECT:- ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE TARMAC AT 
AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON MEDICAL GROUNDS. 
 
 
His Holiness Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Swamigal is hereby permitted  
to take his vehicle up to  the tarmac during  arrival /departure at all airports 
in the country, on medical grounds for a period of  one year with immediate 
effect. 
 
 
 
 (D.S.Chauhan) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution as per list attached/overleaf. 
 
Copy to :  
3. MCA(Shri Gowri Shankar, U/Secretary), RG Bhavan, New Delhi w.r.t 
letter No. AV.13024/39/2007-SS dated 27/10/08.
